QuestData.Title: Eliminate the Shadow Council
QuestData.Description: Those ruins are going to be full of Shadow Council flunkies. We can't afford to let them scatter all over Draenor once you've dealt with Gul'dan.$B$BNo, we need to eliminate every one of them down to the last orc.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Shadow Council members at the Ruins of Ata'gar.
QuestData.RewardText: Necessary business. We don't dare risk letting them grow more powerful.
